title: Public Administration Case Study Development: Mobile-Based Practical Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic administrative terminology and document processing skills
context.additional_context: Content-centered learning accessible via smartphones, integrated with workplace-relevant case studies

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three core issues by analyzing real-world cases in public administration
Learners can propose at least two practical solutions through case-based discussions
Learners can write a one-page A4 case report using templates provided in a mobile environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
